title: Joe Marler: Other England teams have let nerves overcome them and caved in – I don’t feel that in this group
text:
England prop Joe Marler is confident that there will be no repeat of the psychological meltdown that used to afflict the national team as they approached a make-or-break game such as the one they face against Australia in the World Cup quarter-final on Saturday.

Marler admits that he used to get unduly wound-up and recalls the ‘really nervous’ state of the England squad as they headed to Cardiff in 2013 looking to complete a Grand Slam only to end up getting thumped. They were scarred, too, by another Wales experience four years ago at their home World Cup, collapsing in the final...
description: England prop Joe Marler is confident that there will be no repeat of the psychological meltdown that used to afflict the national team as they approached a make-or-break game such as the one they face against Australia in the World Cup quarter-final on Saturday.
